name: Data Grid
description: The main purpose of the component is to display data, and this data can be sorted and filtered.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to disable a component.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to disable a component.

properties.name: sortable
properties.label: Sortable
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify the sorting option for all grid columns.
properties.handlerDescription: This property allows you to specify the sorting option for all grid columns.

properties.name: filter
properties.label: Filter
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add filtering capability to all grid columns.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to add filtering capability to all grid columns.

properties.name: floatingFilter
properties.label: Floating Filter
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify whether or not the floating filter is displayed.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify whether or not the floating filter is displayed.

properties.name: editable
properties.label: Editable
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to control the ability to edit data in the cell.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to control the ability to edit data in the cell

properties.name: resizable
properties.label: Resizable
properties.settingTooltip: Users will be able to change the width of the columns by dragging them.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add the ability to change column widths.

properties.name: suppressCellFocus
properties.label: Suppress Cell Focus
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to disable cell focus and keyboard navigation.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to disable cell focus and keyboard navigation.

properties.name: multipleRowsSelection
properties.label: Multiple Rows Selection
properties.handlerDescription: This handler adds the ability to select multiple rows.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting adds the ability to select multiple rows.

properties.name: columnDefs
properties.label: Column Definition
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to define columns for the component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to define columns for the component.

properties.name: rowsData
properties.label: Rows Data
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to set data to the component.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to set data to the component.

properties.name: height
properties.label: Height
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify the height of the component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the height of the component.

properties.name: width
properties.label: Width
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify the width of the component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the width of the component.

properties.name: theme
properties.label: Theme
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify the theme of the component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the theme of the component.

properties.name: loadingText
properties.label: Loading Text
properties.settingTooltip: This setting lets you specify the text displayed when loading data for the Data Grid component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler lets you specify the text displayed when loading data for the Data Grid component.

properties.name: noRowsText
properties.label: No Rows Text
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify the text displayed when the Data Grid component has received no rows.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the text displayed when the Data Grid component has received no rows.

properties.name: pagination
properties.label: Pagination
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add pagination.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to add pagination.

properties.name: paginationAutoPageSize
properties.label: Pagination Auto Page Size
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows automatically showing as many rows on each page as possible.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows automatically showing as many rows on each page as possible.

properties.name: paginationPageSize
properties.label: Pagination Page Size
properties.settingTooltip: does not work when Pagination Auto Page Size is selected
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the required number of rows to display on each page. Does not work when Pagination Auto Page Size is selected!

eventHandlers.name: onCellValueChanged
eventHandlers.label: On Cell Value Changed Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when Enter is pressed after the cell value has changed.

eventHandlers.name: onCellClick
eventHandlers.label: On Cell Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user clicks the mouse or taps the grid cell.

eventHandlers.name: onColumnMoved
eventHandlers.label: On Column Moved Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when any column is moved.
